channel.title: How do I load a new varbit or increase the varbit cache array size?
channel.description:
Original Question:
[code]Okay, so I cache packed 667 data. No problem.
Then, I cache packed the NPC.dat files, OBJECT.dat files, NPC.idx files, etc. Now, when I log in, the client freezes instantly and I can't see myself. It freezes on the place where I was last standing, for example edgeville bank. But I can't see myself.
PS - I have all of the readValues added (Thanks Chris^!)
What's wrong?
PSS - It doesn't throw any compiler errors. PSSS - That's an amulet of power in my inventory. IDK why it looks like that.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lSTCkWZ.jpg[/IMG][/code]
Their Response: (see question)

item.title: How do I load a new varbit or increase the varbit cache array size?
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

Original Question:

[code]Okay, so I cache packed 667 data. No problem.

Then, I cache packed the NPC.dat files, OBJECT.dat files, NPC.idx files, etc.
Now, when I log in, the client freezes instantly and I can’t see myself. It freezes on the place where I was last standing, for example edgeville bank. But I can’t see myself.

PS - I have all of the readValues added (Thanks Chris^!)

What’s wrong?

PSSS - That’s an amulet of power in my inventory. IDK why it looks like that.
